dataElement.name: Natural Death Reportable to Medicolegal Authority

dataValueTemplate.annotation: select count(distinct p.person_id) from openmrs.person p, openmrs.obs o where p.voided = 0 and o.voided = 0 and o.person_id = p.person_id and o.value_coded = 161742 and Date(o.obs_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and Date(o.obs_datetime) <= :endOfPeriod and o.location_id = :locationId
